=========
Templates
=========

**pipeline** comes with some pre-defined templates for common tasks in a scientific
project. Check the templates to see what options are available and what internal code is
executed.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Utilities

   load_data

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Estimation

   ols
   logit
   probit
   estimation


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Results

   stargazer
